We may monitor use to

title: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve user data.

tosdr.case: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve user data.
tosdr.tldr:
The Terms of Use (in Part A, applicable to users unless you are in Europe) state, "Any information obtained by monitoring, reviewing, or recording activity on the Brainly Services is subject to review by us or on our behalf as well as by law enforcement organizations in connection with investigation or prosecution of possible criminal activity on the Brainly Services. Brainly will comply with all court orders involving requests for such information."

 It is also stated in the Privacy Policy that personal information may be shared with "third parties as required by law or subpoena or if we reasonably believe that such action is necessary to (a) comply with the law and the reasonable requests of law enforcement; (b) to enforce our Terms of Service or to protect the security or integrity of our Service; and/or (c) to exercise or protect the rights, property, or personal safety of Brainly, our visitors, or others."
